segments.text: What would you like for dessert ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have apple pie , ice cream , chocolate cake and fruit cocktail .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I have apple pie with ice cream ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . I made apple pie this morning , so it ’ s lovely and fresh .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I love you home made apple pie . It ’ s delicious . Can I have another glass of lemonade as well ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . Can you get it yourself ? It ’ s in the refrigerator .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . Would you like a drink too ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I ’ ll have an ice tea . You ’ ll see it next to the lemonade .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ ll have apple pie too , but without ice cream . I have to watch my weight .
segments.speaker: S1
